content.p: Surviving poverty in late antique Rome Please note that this is an online talk and the MS Teams link will be advertised closer to the date. Please email the organiser (matt.thompson1@nottingham.ac.uk) link if you would like to attend Join us for research seminars with a selection of visiting academics, alongside University of Nottingham researchers. All students and staff are very welcome. Free to attend. For further information or to join the mailing list, please contact Matt Thompson. Contact details Archaeology twitter Classics twitter
